divs: Sighting Details2 separate lights 1 disappear 2nd slow dim to dark could see it curve upward vanish there was a low hush slow overhead than 1 disapears continue slow 2nd light disapears but see craft curve upward away from me, round in shape probly 1000ft up, craft looked to be no more than 50ft across..
Summary: 2 separate lights 1 disappear 2nd slow dim to dark could see it curve upward vanish
